nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: The palace wall rises like a cliff. The city’s noise fades behind you. Every step feels counted.

set.currentObjective: Complete the ritual at the marked spot.

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: A young guard coughs in the shadows—more afraid than fierce. If you silence him, you can pass. If you spare him, you risk Heat… and keep your hands clean.
